Supercharge your memory with the Genius version of our best-selling, electronic, light-up memory game, BrainBolt®! Watch as up to 21 lights flash at random, then challenge your brain to repeat the patterns without missing a beat. Five new genius levels, randomised patterns, and solo or head-to-head modes make this portable hand-held brain bender the perfect way to play – at home or on the go!

       If you loved and conquered original BrainBolt (https://www.learningresources.co.uk/electronic-memory-game), then level up your memory skills with BrainBolt Genius, the brain teaser that’s so much fun, you won’t be able to put it down!

  
 * There are all-new game modes, three colours of LED lights, and colour-coded multiplayer gameplay. 
 * Train your brain! BrainBolt Genius starts off with a simple sequence, but it gets longer and more complicated as the games continue. 
 * Playing this fun hand-held electronic game improves memory and cognitive skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and builds problem-solving skills, visual scanning skills, and more. 
 * This portable, hand-held light-up game is perfect for planes, trains, road trips, waiting rooms, or anywhere you train your brain. There are two volume settings so young geniuses can play without the sound on. 
 * It’s addictive, puzzle-playing fun for players ages 7 to 107! 
 * Requires 3AAA batteries not included.     Suitable for ages 7+

Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work. This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations! Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits. description: Creative Tattoo Studio Unleash your inner artist and become a master tattooist with this incredible Professional Studio Tattoos kit. Designed for aspiring creatives aged 7 and up, this comprehensive set provides everything you need to design, apply, and even make your temporary tattoos sparkle. The core of the experience is the innovative stamp pen, which allows you to easily transfer stencils onto your skin. Simply select your desired stencil, position it carefully, and then use the pen to apply the ink, mimicking the precision of a professional tattoo artist. For those looking to explore their own artistic vision, the tattoo pen can be placed in the included tool, enabling you to draw freehand designs or add intricate details and vibrant colours to your stencils. Imagine crafting unique, personalized artwork that truly expresses your imagination. But the creativity doesn't stop there. Elevate your creations by adding a touch of glamour with the included glitter, making your temporary tattoos shimmer and shine for any occasion. To further enhance the fun and excitement, the kit also features four sheets of temporary tattoos, offering a dazzling array of colourful and even glow-in-the-dark designs that will captivate and delight. When it’s time to change your look, the beauty of these temporary tattoos lies in their easy removal. Depending on the specific tattoo and your skin type, you can simply wash them away with soap and water or use a standard make-up remover to effortlessly erase your artwork, allowing for endless creative experimentation. This studio offers a safe and engaging way to explore artistic expression and imaginative play, all while developing fine motor skills and a sense of personal style. It’s a fantastic activity for solo playdates or shared creative sessions, providing hours of entertainment and artistic exploration for young minds eager to make their mark. The inclusion of both stencils and the freedom of freehand drawing caters to various skill levels and preferences, ensuring that every child can find their groove and create stunning temporary body art that they’ll be proud to showcase. The kit promotes not just creativity but also a gentle introduction to the concept of temporary body art, fostering confidence and individuality through self-expression.

Become a real tattoo artist with your own Tattoos studio. Choose a stencil, place it on your skin and apply the ink using the stamp pen. Place the tattoo pen in the tool provided to draw freehand, or colour stencils in like a real tattoo artist. You can also apply glitter to make your tattoo sparkle. 4 sheets of temporary tattoos are also included for colourful, glow-in-the-dark tattoos. Ink, felt pen and temporary tattoos can be removed after a few days by washing or using make-up remover, depending on the tattoo and skin type. Age: From 7 years old

title: Kids Temporary Tattoo Professional Studio Kit - Stamp Pen, Stencils, Ink, Glitter & Glow-in-the-Dark Tattoos Ages 7+
Professional Studio Tattoos
description: Creative Tattoo Studio Unleash your inner artist and become a master tattooist with this incredible Professional Studio Tattoos kit. Designed for aspiring creatives aged 7 and up, this comprehensive set provides everything you need to design, apply, and even make your temporary tattoos sparkle. The core of the experience is the innovative stamp pen, which allows you to easily transfer stencils onto your skin. Simply select your desired stencil, position it carefully, and then use the pen to apply the ink, mimicking the precision of a professional tattoo artist. For those looking to explore their own artistic vision, the tattoo pen can be placed in the included tool, enabling you to draw freehand designs or add intricate details and vibrant colours to your stencils. Imagine crafting unique, personalized artwork that truly expresses your imagination. But the creativity doesn't stop there. Elevate your creations by adding a touch of glamour with the included glitter, making your temporary tattoos shimmer and shine for any occasion. To further enhance the fun and excitement, the kit also features four sheets of temporary tattoos, offering a dazzling array of colourful and even glow-in-the-dark designs that will captivate and delight. When it’s time to change your look, the beauty of these temporary tattoos lies in their easy removal. Depending on the specific tattoo and your skin type, you can simply wash them away with soap and water or use a standard make-up remover to effortlessly erase your artwork, allowing for endless creative experimentation. This studio offers a safe and engaging way to explore artistic expression and imaginative play, all while developing fine motor skills and a sense of personal style. It’s a fantastic activity for solo playdates or shared creative sessions, providing hours of entertainment and artistic exploration for young minds eager to make their mark. The inclusion of both stencils and the freedom of freehand drawing caters to various skill levels and preferences, ensuring that every child can find their groove and create stunning temporary body art that they’ll be proud to showcase. The kit promotes not just creativity but also a gentle introduction to the concept of temporary body art, fostering confidence and individuality through self-expression.

Become a real tattoo artist with your own Tattoos studio. Choose a stencil, place it on your skin and apply the ink using the stamp pen. Place the tattoo pen in the tool provided to draw freehand, or colour stencils in like a real tattoo artist. You can also apply glitter to make your tattoo sparkle. 4 sheets of temporary tattoos are also included for colourful, glow-in-the-dark tattoos. Ink, felt pen and temporary tattoos can be removed after a few days by washing or using make-up remover, depending on the tattoo and skin type. Age: From 7 years old

Professional Studio Tattoos
description: Creative Tattoo Studio Unleash your inner artist and become a master tattooist with this incredible Professional Studio Tattoos kit. Designed for aspiring creatives aged 7 and up, this comprehensive set provides everything you need to design, apply, and even make your temporary tattoos sparkle. The core of the experience is the innovative stamp pen, which allows you to easily transfer stencils onto your skin. Simply select your desired stencil, position it carefully, and then use the pen to apply the ink, mimicking the precision of a professional tattoo artist. For those looking to explore their own artistic vision, the tattoo pen can be placed in the included tool, enabling you to draw freehand designs or add intricate details and vibrant colours to your stencils. Imagine crafting unique, personalized artwork that truly expresses your imagination. But the creativity doesn't stop there. Elevate your creations by adding a touch of glamour with the included glitter, making your temporary tattoos shimmer and shine for any occasion. To further enhance the fun and excitement, the kit also features four sheets of temporary tattoos, offering a dazzling array of colourful and even glow-in-the-dark designs that will captivate and delight. When it’s time to change your look, the beauty of these temporary tattoos lies in their easy removal. Depending on the specific tattoo and your skin type, you can simply wash them away with soap and water or use a standard make-up remover to effortlessly erase your artwork, allowing for endless creative experimentation. This studio offers a safe and engaging way to explore artistic expression and imaginative play, all while developing fine motor skills and a sense of personal style. It’s a fantastic activity for solo playdates or shared creative sessions, providing hours of entertainment and artistic exploration for young minds eager to make their mark. The inclusion of both stencils and the freedom of freehand drawing caters to various skill levels and preferences, ensuring that every child can find their groove and create stunning temporary body art that they’ll be proud to showcase. The kit promotes not just creativity but also a gentle introduction to the concept of temporary body art, fostering confidence and individuality through self-expression.

Become a real tattoo artist with your own Tattoos studio. Choose a stencil, place it on your skin and apply the ink using the stamp pen. Place the tattoo pen in the tool provided to draw freehand, or colour stencils in like a real tattoo artist. You can also apply glitter to make your tattoo sparkle. 4 sheets of temporary tattoos are also included for colourful, glow-in-the-dark tattoos. title: Kids Temporary Tattoo Professional Studio Kit - Stamp Pen, Stencils, Ink, Glitter & Glow-in-the-Dark Tattoos Ages 7+
Professional Studio Tattoos
description: Creative Tattoo Studio Unleash your inner artist and become a master tattooist with this incredible Professional Studio Tattoos kit. Designed for aspiring creatives aged 7 and up, this comprehensive set provides everything you need to design, apply, and even make your temporary tattoos sparkle. The core of the experience is the innovative stamp pen, which allows you to easily transfer stencils onto your skin. Simply select your desired stencil, position it carefully, and then use the pen to apply the ink, mimicking the precision of a professional tattoo artist. For those looking to explore their own artistic vision, the tattoo pen can be placed in the included tool, enabling you to draw freehand designs or add intricate details and vibrant colours to your stencils. Imagine crafting unique, personalized artwork that truly expresses your imagination. But the creativity doesn't stop there. Elevate your creations by adding a touch of glamour with the included glitter, making your temporary tattoos shimmer and shine for any occasion. To further enhance the fun and excitement, the kit also features four sheets of temporary tattoos, offering a dazzling array of colourful and even glow-in-the-dark designs that will captivate and delight. When it’s time to change your look, the beauty of these temporary tattoos lies in their easy removal. Depending on the specific tattoo and your skin type, you can simply wash them away with soap and water or use a standard make-up remover to effortlessly erase your artwork, allowing for endless creative experimentation. This studio offers a safe and engaging way to explore artistic expression and imaginative play, all while developing fine motor skills and a sense of personal style. It’s a fantastic activity for solo playdates or shared creative sessions, providing hours of entertainment and artistic exploration for young minds eager to make their mark. The inclusion of both stencils and the freedom of freehand drawing caters to various skill levels and preferences, ensuring that every child can find their groove and create stunning temporary body art that they’ll be proud to showcase. The kit promotes not just creativity but also a gentle introduction to the concept of temporary body art, fostering confidence and individuality through self-expression.

Become a real tattoo artist with your own Tattoos studio. Choose a stencil, place it on your skin and apply the ink using the stamp pen. Place the tattoo pen in the tool provided to draw freehand, or colour stencils in like a real tattoo artist. You can also apply glitter to make your tattoo sparkle. 4 sheets of temporary tattoos are also included for colourful, glow-in-the-dark tattoos. Ink, felt pen and temporary tattoos can be removed after a few days by washing or using make-up remover, depending on the tattoo and skin type. Age: From 7 years old

title: Kids Temporary Tattoo Professional Studio Kit - Stamp Pen, Stencils, Ink, Glitter & Glow-in-the-Dark Tattoos Ages 7+
Professional Studio Tattoos
description: Creative Tattoo Studio Unleash your inner artist and become a master tattooist with this incredible Professional Studio Tattoos kit. Designed for aspiring creatives aged 7 and up, this comprehensive set provides everything you need to design, apply, and even make your temporary tattoos sparkle. The core of the experience is the innovative stamp pen, which allows you to easily transfer stencils onto your skin. Simply select your desired stencil, position it carefully, and then use the pen to apply the ink, mimicking the precision of a professional tattoo artist. For those looking to explore their own artistic vision, the tattoo pen can be placed in the included tool, enabling you to draw freehand designs or add intricate details and vibrant colours to your stencils. Imagine crafting unique, personalized artwork that truly expresses your imagination. But the creativity doesn't stop there. Elevate your creations by adding a touch of glamour with the included glitter, making your temporary tattoos shimmer and shine for any occasion. To further enhance the fun and excitement, the kit also features four sheets of temporary tattoos, offering a dazzling array of colourful and even glow-in-the-dark designs that will captivate and delight. When it’s time to change your look, the beauty of these temporary tattoos lies in their easy removal. Depending on the specific tattoo and your skin type, you can simply wash them away with soap and water or use a standard make-up remover to effortlessly erase your artwork, allowing for endless creative experimentation. This studio offers a safe and engaging way to explore artistic expression and imaginative play, all while developing fine motor skills and a sense of personal style. It’s a fantastic activity for solo playdates or shared creative sessions, providing hours of entertainment and artistic exploration for young minds eager to make their mark. The inclusion of both stencils and the freedom of freehand drawing caters to various skill levels and preferences, ensuring that every child can find their groove and create stunning temporary body art that they’ll be proud to showcase. The kit promotes not just creativity but also a gentle introduction to the concept of temporary body art, fostering confidence and individuality through self-expression.

Become a real tattoo artist with your own Tattoos studio. Choose a stencil, place it on your skin and apply the ink using the stamp pen. Place the tattoo pen in the tool provided to draw freehand, or colour stencils in like a real tattoo artist. You can also apply glitter to make your tattoo sparkle. 4 sheets of temporary tattoos are also included for colourful, glow-in-the-dark tattoos. Ink, felt pen and temporary tattoos can be removed after a few days by washing or using make-up remover, depending on the tattoo and skin type. Age: From 7 years old

Supercharge your memory with the Genius version of our best-selling, electronic, light-up memory game, BrainBolt®! Watch as up to 21 lights flash at random, then challenge your brain to repeat the patterns without missing a beat. Five new genius levels, randomised patterns, and solo or head-to-head modes make this portable hand-held brain bender the perfect way to play – at home or on the go!

       If you loved and conquered original BrainBolt (https://www.learningresources.co.uk/electronic-memory-game), then level up your memory skills with BrainBolt Genius, the brain teaser that’s so much fun, you won’t be able to put it down!

  
 * There are all-new game modes, three colours of LED lights, and colour-coded multiplayer gameplay. 
 * Train your brain! BrainBolt Genius starts off with a simple sequence, but it gets longer and more complicated as the games continue. 
 * Playing this fun hand-held electronic game improves memory and cognitive skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and builds problem-solving skills, visual scanning skills, and more. 
 * This portable, hand-held light-up game is perfect for planes, trains, road trips, waiting rooms, or anywhere you train your brain. There are two volume settings so young geniuses can play without the sound on. 
 * It’s addictive, puzzle-playing fun for players ages 7 to 107!

Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work. This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits. title: Kids Temporary Tattoo Professional Studio Kit - Stamp Pen, Stencils, Ink, Glitter & Glow-in-the-Dark Tattoos Ages 7+
Professional Studio Tattoos
description: Creative Tattoo Studio Unleash your inner artist and become a master tattooist with this incredible Professional Studio Tattoos kit. Designed for aspiring creatives aged 7 and up, this comprehensive set provides everything you need to design, apply, and even make your temporary tattoos sparkle. The core of the experience is the innovative stamp pen, which allows you to easily transfer stencils onto your skin. Simply select your desired stencil, position it carefully, and then use the pen to apply the ink, mimicking the precision of a professional tattoo artist. For those looking to explore their own artistic vision, the tattoo pen can be placed in the included tool, enabling you to draw freehand designs or add intricate details and vibrant colours to your stencils. Imagine crafting unique, personalized artwork that truly expresses your imagination. But the creativity doesn't stop there. Elevate your creations by adding a touch of glamour with the included glitter, making your temporary tattoos shimmer and shine for any occasion. To further enhance the fun and excitement, the kit also features four sheets of temporary tattoos, offering a dazzling array of colourful and even glow-in-the-dark designs that will captivate and delight. When it’s time to change your look, the beauty of these temporary tattoos lies in their easy removal. Depending on the specific tattoo and your skin type, you can simply wash them away with soap and water or use a standard make-up remover to effortlessly erase your artwork, allowing for endless creative experimentation. This studio offers a safe and engaging way to explore artistic expression and imaginative play, all while developing fine motor skills and a sense of personal style. It’s a fantastic activity for solo playdates or shared creative sessions, providing hours of entertainment and artistic exploration for young minds eager to make their mark. The inclusion of both stencils and the freedom of freehand drawing caters to various skill levels and preferences, ensuring that every child can find their groove and create stunning temporary body art that they’ll be proud to showcase. The kit promotes not just creativity but also a gentle introduction to the concept of temporary body art, fostering confidence and individuality through self-expression.

Become a real tattoo artist with your own Tattoos studio. Choose a stencil, place it on your skin and apply the ink using the stamp pen. Place the tattoo pen in the tool provided to draw freehand, or colour stencils in like a real tattoo artist. You can also apply glitter to make your tattoo sparkle. 4 sheets of temporary tattoos are also included for colourful, glow-in-the-dark tattoos. Ink, felt pen and temporary tattoos can be removed after a few days by washing or using make-up remover, depending on the tattoo and skin type. Age: From 7 years old
